body_html: @apaszke Then let's change the group's limit as well instead of letting it OOM or running into some unknown territory. I am thinking, we should only cache the most recent used X communicators (I prefer X < 10) and clear the rest, and recreated it if it is used again. If some communicator orders are only used once, it is not worth of keeping it cached.
